array.name: Units Protection from Shoot
array.desc: Reduces the damage taken by the hero's army from shoot attacks by 25%

array.name: Units Health
array.desc: Increases the health of all units by 5%

array.name: Units Defence
array.desc: Increases the Defense of all units by 10%

array.name: Units Initiative
array.desc: Increases the initiative of all units by 1 point

array.name: Units attack penetration
array.desc: Units ignore 25% of the attacker's damage

array.name: Hero Move Points
array.desc: Increases the hero's world movement points by 10%

array.name: Hero March of War
array.desc: After each battle won, the hero regains 10% of his maximum movement points
